website_summaries.verdict: Though they sport some nice features and customer service is attentive, these toe separators come with some size and durability concerns.
pros: Constructed without latex in a rubber material
A design that stretches toes with minimal break-in time for most customers
The 2 pairs come in a handy wooden storage box
cons: Some sizing issues have been reported
Separators have been known to tear or break with typical use

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put in. Can already feel then working. Very comfortable- unlike others I have tried these can easily be worn while wearing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Reed

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is iffy, uncomfortable in running shoes, not wide enough.
customer_reviews.text: ** Edit** I added some pictures of what I wear on when I go hiking or jogging. A mix of 3 products gives me some very good comfort! I really like these, but they cannot be worn in shoes, even shoes with a wide toe box. They are quite painful to walk/run with. Also the size seems weird. Maybe i Need a large? Also, they are not wide enough to keep both joints of the toes separated evenly. This can cause you to develop hammer toe because the 2nd joint isn't held in place. Quality seems ok, and nice storage box.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: The fit was great! (soft but sturdy) but one of my pairs ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit was great! (soft but sturdy) but one of my pairs ripped just a few weeks after I bought them. (They tore right where the big toe is) They advertise that you can wear them while doing yoga but i just walked around in my house while wearing them and it ripped. I still use the other pair but it's smaller so it isn't effective for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than a month of usage
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product except that after only a month of wearing them, they started breaking. First, it was the plastic on the outside of the big toe. Then, it was between other toes. I was really disappointed they didn’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: One pair was used...
customer_reviews.text: The product themselves are good and do exactly what they say. However, one of the pairs I recieved had obviously been worn before. The small size is discolored and had what looked like cat hair stuck to them when I took them out of the bag. I washed them but the discoloration stayed, it is disappointing that the company would resell an obviously used product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Actually surprised
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for 3 months now. The first month, I could only keep them on for maybe an hour, before it became painful. But now I’ll wear them on and off through the day, during yoga and for a little while at night. Has definitely made improvements in my feet (former dancer, also very poor in childhood, always had shoes that were way to small and toes bent in). Yoga has been, well I can’t say easier but my balance has completely improved. I feel my feet are flatter to the ground now. The material has held up extremely well. I love the box they came in.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: All feet are different!
customer_reviews.text: I have short toes and this product did not work for me. By short toes, I mean the bones between the sole of my foot and the pads of my toes are very short. Versus toes that look like fingers... I recommend measuring the length of those toe bones and seeing if they match the dimensions of this product. I was able to return them easily.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy R

customer_reviews.title: Didn't quite know what to expect
customer_reviews.text: I have worn orthotics my entire life after having bunion surgery when I was a teenager - now that I'm in my 60's I am working daily on keeping my feet in shape and my toes straight and spaced apart - these are wonderful for accomplishing both - they are very soft and pliable and comfortable to wear - you receive two different sizes, and I actually use both, although the smaller size is easier to wear for a longer period of time - I only use them in the evening when I'm watching TV - would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: LizF

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy toe spreaders.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried lots of toe spreaders and these are some of my favorite. The feel is really smooth, they're easy to get on/off, and they're comfortable when wearing. The spreading action helps with pain in my toe joints. I also like that they send two pairs, although they're two sizes so unless you know someone with bigger/smaller toes, the extra one is kind of a waste. Also, if you're looking for something to wear while exercising or going about your life, these won't work for you as you'll feel the bumps on the bottom. These are only good for wearing while relaxing or sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: barg

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Bunions, Fits in Shoes Comfortably
customer_reviews.text: My feet have started to develop bunions which make it hard to do 8 hour shifts on my feet. It’s too early to tell if this will help with the pain long term, but they are comfortable to wear, and they do fit inside my shoes with room to spare. I thought the wooden box was a fancy touch to an otherwise simple product.
customer_reviews.author: C4479

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. At first it seemed like the perfect separator but after wearing it at home with my very wide Crocs it was hurting. It was pressing titly of each toe and when I took it off you could visibly see pressure dents on my toes. I have thin, normal toes. It made no difference wich one I used, the small r the medium. Both had the same effect.
customer_reviews.author: SarahNu

customer_reviews.title: Would But Again
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in the ball of one foot, and I ordered these to help improve my toe mobility. I tried another popular brand, but didn't find them that comfortable, so I didn't use them (they just felt too wide between my toes and didn't stay in p!ace while I slept). These come in two sizes, and because they slide over and between the toes, versus just sliding between the toes, they stay in p!ace while I am sleeping. They are soft and comfy. I am super happy with this purchase, and also love the storage box that came with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dani-gal

customer_reviews.title: Feet Rejuvenators
customer_reviews.text: Using these an hour or so at night with my feet propped up while I am reading and my feet feel refreshed and restored. I especially appreciate the wooden storage box which sits conveniently on my night table. The distance between the toes is perfect, just enough for a really good stretch and not too much to cause discomfort. The gel material, the perfect material for comfort and stretching cramped toes. does "stick" to upholstery fabric and carpets, so be prepared and have everything that you need close-by before you settle in for the real treat that these toe spreaders are.
customer_reviews.author: Terre Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to strengthen & lengthen my toes, muscles & ligaments, also for better balance and gait while doing yoga and weight training. I love them! The small fit me perfect, I wear a size 7.5 in womens. The medium fit my husband. They are soft & very comfortable. I where mine around the house or relaxing and I forget I have them on. They are great quality and bonus...I love the cute wood box they came in.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Brought these with me to a training camp, and they helped relieve the tension and stress in my feet. I made sure to stretch my feet out and had some massage balls as well, so I can't say it was 100% from the tomatoes. But, as someone who has had plantar fasciitis in the past and keeps an eye on what I'm hoping won't become bunions, I think this definitely helped. I feel like when I used this for even a few minutes each day my feet are more relaxed and I feel more energized. I've added this into my daily routine, and feel like the quality is in this product to last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Candice G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been wearing these a few days and I am already feeling them work. I followed the instructions to start off slow and being I am a runner and do all kinds of workouts to stay strong, these are holding up and so far they work well with everything I do. And the amazing way they are packaged is just impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Yoga Practice Addition
customer_reviews.text: Interesting product. I don’t have any foot pain, but saw this might be a good addition to assist in balancing postures for my yoga practice. I’ve worn them off and on for a half hour to an hour at a time both on and off my mat. I find their grip makes me have to adjust postures in my yoga practice, but worn just around the house I can feel them stretching the muscles around my toes and the top of my feet. I think it’s too early to tell if it’s helping my balance but will update in a few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought these sooner!!
customer_reviews.text: You are provided two sizes. I have small feet. I wish the small was a little smaller but that's my only complaint. They are very comfortable. Easy to clean. I've noticed a change in my feet after over a week of using them. I have been starting slowly and increase my time little by little. The pain in my feet is reducing. Great product. Especially because they aren't hard like most on the market. You can walk in them and wear socks at same time. I haven't worn with sneakers yet.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Chiarella Delia

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE!!!! Coming home after work I used to just want to get out of the work clothes. Now the first thing I do is put on my toe spreaders! I carry stress in my feet and these are almost as good as a massage. I can leave them on while relaxing or cooking dinner or sleeping. Don't hesitate, fabulous purchase and you get 2 pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these most of the day now, and my foot pain has decreased noticeably. I have arthritis in my big toe joints, and was developing a hammer toe, and have also had plantars fasciitis periodically. Somehow wearing these is helping with these issues. In addition, the original order only had one set in the box, I contacted the company and they immediately sent me a new order at no charge. And the very nice wooden box they come in is an unexpected bonus! If you are even thinking about it and you have foot pain, I highly recommend this product/company!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi K

customer_reviews.title: Game Changing for Hiking and Backpacking!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set of these that I have purchased — one for a gift and two sets for myself. Plus, each set comes with a small and a large pair, so gifts are two-in-one! I use one set regularly in my yoga practice and any time I have achey feet, and I have found that these are invaluable during backpacking trips and after long hikes. Sleeping in them virtually eliminates any aches and pains in my feet from daytime mileage and leaves me feeling ready to go the next morning. Lifesavers!
customer_reviews.author: I'd Like a Lollipop

customer_reviews.title: YogaBody Toe Spreaders
customer_reviews.text: I've had them less than a week and the strap between my large & second toe has already broken on my right foot, which is where I need them the most. A little difficult to get all 5 toes in the holes on the foot with the bunion and easy on the other foot without any. I don't have any pain issues, so they're not uncomfortable but need getting use to. The concept is good but I don't think they're very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I just started exercising and I found my feet hurt more than anything when done! I prefer being barefoot, but wear shoes when out and when working out of course. When I get home I shower, and then put these on. Even after just a few minutes I have relief! My feet feel better and they are comfortable! I have wide feet and fat toes but they are fine! I have even worn them in my shoes when working out! I did my research before hand and found runners really like this brand and I can see why!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healed my plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Had horrible pain in my heels for months and couldn't figure out how to heal it. Then someone recommended toe separators. I started using these and within days felt relief. Slept with them for a few weeks, and the pain was completely gone. Much cheaper than getting MRIs, cortisone injections, or physical therapy, and I have them if the pain ever starts up again.
customer_reviews.author: bohemia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: to me by my physical therapist. She has a pair and couldn't say enough good about them. Thought I should get them to help with a bunion that is very painful. It only took a couple of days to get used to them. I now wear them about 3 hours a day. These may be easier for women to get used to because they are similar - although much more comfortable - to the separators we use for pedicures. I'm even able to wear them with my flip flops!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Sry soft
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had my pain with my toes so theses toe separators can’t help there. My problem is that me toe next to my little toe curves toward my middle toe and if the toe nail is not cut perfectly It cuts into my middle toe. It only shows up because I walk 20 to 30 miles a week and on some days up to 10 miles. I’m hoping these toe separators will help. I won’t know for sure for a while as I’ve had them less than a week but there are early signs that they will.
customer_reviews.author: Dwbid42

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously great! Insanely comfy, I can wear them for hours and am over the moon that you can walk in them. I also appreciate that you get 2 pairs, they're both useful to me. The smalls fit in a pair of athletic shoes so I've done a little walking in them (went too far yesterday, 4 miles, and got a blister), but I work at home and am always barefoot anyway, so I'm wearing the mediums throughout my day. I originally got them hoping to wear them in my running shoes but I think the amount of time I'll be wearing them barefoot makes wearing them shod unnecessary. I'm size 8.5 shoe for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Pliable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to stretch my toes out after wearing cleats or working out. My biggest issue is my pinky toe is smashed against my foot in most cleats and it gets painful on the side of my foot. I started wearing these around the house for a few hours before bed. Stretches my toes out and I can wear them with my house shoes. If I wear them for more than 2 hours my pinky toe starts to hurt. I've noticed that my toes are now more separated when I am walking around barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Increased balance and relaxation
customer_reviews.text: The material these are made of is very soft and skin-like. They’re not exactly “comfortable” when wearing, buy they’re not as uncomfortable as regular toe separators. However the feeling when you take them off is wonderful. You can feel your foot relaxing instantly, and that feeling lasts a long time. When used during yoga practice, they definitely increased the ability to balance for longer periods of time. All in all great product!
customer_reviews.author: andraS

customer_reviews.title: I had to return these
customer_reviews.text: These come in two sizes in the (very nice) box. Unfortunately, neither size fit me. One was super huge, and the other seemed to fit, but was very uncomfortable. The area between your toes, or my toes was very wide. I wore the medium size around the house for a bit, but they made my feet hurt. On the plus side, the material seemed to be durable and I was able to wash them with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Campmommie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I can't explain how much I love these things. I've had a gait issue on the left side of my body for years that have led to hip, ankle, and shoulder problems. I would constantly get foot cramps after work because my toes were cramped in my flats for work all day. I wear these around the house and can immediately tell my gait is improved. I also wear these anytime I wear flip flops. I'm not able to wear them in wide toed shoes like advertised, but that's no big deal. These are definitely worth the money if you have any type of gait issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice stretch
customer_reviews.text: I've had these a few days, and I'm digging them so far. I can definitely feel the stretch - it feels good. Yeah, if you're looking for toe spreaders, these are good. I'm not going to write more because it's 10:30 on a Friday night and I'm writing a review about Toe Spreaders.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable way to correct your finger posture
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear for long periods of time while barefoot. I can tell space improvement​ between my toes and more mobility around my fingers. Like it's supposed to be. But you gotta leave those thight pointy shoes, y'all.
customer_reviews.author: Adria

customer_reviews.title: These things work!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect when I ordered these toe spreaders. But they arrived quickly, and I started wearing them for an hour or so, then increased the time. After I week I noticed a difference. The past few years I noticed I was beginning to get "hammer toe" and I didn't relish the thought of an eventual surgery, but even after this short time, my toes seem to be straightening out! They are comfortable to wear, and I plan on continuing to use them. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: David Deavenport

customer_reviews.title: These work
customer_reviews.text: I like how they have 2 different sizes, as one was too tight and the other perfect. We ordered them for my husband who has been having pain in his foot, and the larger size was perfect ... but since he was having great results, I tried out the smaller pair which worked for my toe size and though I didn't have pain, they have opened up my stance and I feel will help prevent me from having future potential pain that I would have had otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pain enders.
customer_reviews.text: Its incredible to think that my misshapen toes would ever be pain free again. Since I started using the yoga body toe spreaders I have been free of pain in my feet. I have the problem in both feet where my second toe has turned over the first. And on my right foot the fourth toe has done that to the third. Then the nail cuts into the adjoining toe.They keep the toes spread in such a way that there is no friction from the neighbor. I tried the single toe spreaders I purchased in the pharmacy and they don't stay in place. These stay on when you put them on. Thanks for inventing these
customer_reviews.author: Armando Russo

customer_reviews.title: Working
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I'm already seeing improvement in keep my toes straight/aligned. Very soft yet firm material. Easy to keep clean. It's working out very well and hope it continues. Really like the nice wooden box it comes in. I watched the video associated with this product and only put them on for 15 minutes at a time. You can feel them working and just like any other form of physical exercise, you will feel some soreness after removing them. I use them every day and the soreness has already faded. They are very comfortable and after a while you don't realize your wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: allaboutcats

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and shipping
customer_reviews.text: It’s difficult to make a toe separator that’s firm yet flexible, and that you want to let stay on for an extended period of time. I like the width and material but it’s still not as comfortable as I’d like, also not sure how effective for my bunions but I’ll keep using them as this pain has been going on for 1.5 years and I don’t expect one month to make a difference quite yet. The seller has been absolutely wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Morton’s Neuroma Relief
customer_reviews.text: I have Morton’s Neuroma and these help relieve the pressure at the end of the day when I take my shoes off. They help relieve foot pain on days that I wear heels and I have already recommended them to multiple family members and anyone with foot pain, bunions, etc. Love the packaging that they came in and I think that they are high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: KG303

customer_reviews.title: My favorite toe spreaders at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am a physical therapist who has also had foot surgery. I originally got a different brand of toe spreaders (Yogatoes) from my podiatrist, and they were difficult to put on and really hard to tolerate for very long, and way too big to wear inside shoes . These are easy to put on and I can walk around barefoot in them at home, haven't tried them inside shoes yet, (the one thing is that silicone tends to stick to socks(. I think they're great and will recommend them to my patients who are developing bunions, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Deal-Whitacre

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: These work!! Haven't been able to build up more than an hour yet on my overlapping and hammer toes but these are the first toe separators I am really happy with. I keep them all over my house in various spots to put on at random while sitting on the computer and watching TV. I put them on at night before I go to bed for about 30 minutes but can't sleep with them yet. They are doing the job. My toes are looking better slowly. Not an instant fix but slow and steady.
customer_reviews.author: Stray Acres

customer_reviews.title: I really like these toe spacers
customer_reviews.text: I really like these toe spacers. They are really soft like gummy worm candy and do a great job spacing out your toes. They are thin enough that I can wear them with flip-flops. I also have a pair of "Correct Toes" toe spacers. Correct Toes are better for wearing inside of socks and shoes because the Yogabody spacers are so soft that the edges flip back when you try to put a sock on. But, other than that, I think the Yogabody spacers are just as good at spacing your toes apart.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: Sorry Lucas, we only bought this because we bought your 21 day hip challenge course. As much as I want to like it, It is painful, and that comes from someone who is inclined to believe in you. Also, the box must cost 3x the toe spreaders
customer_reviews.author: Llenroc

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, relief, and strength.
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty small toes and I thought these might be too big. Of course, the bigger size was given to my boyfriend but the smallest one was perfect. My toes feel completely relieved after a long day of wearing high heels or uncomfortable shoes. One afternoon, I left them on mi night stand and my dog chewed them for about two hours. I was impressed after checking them and finding that they don’t even have a single hole. Like nothing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: I love the box they come in!
customer_reviews.text: I really should, but I rarely actually find myself motivated enough to write reviews for things I’ve purchased. This is one of those times when I am so impressed with a product, I just have to write about it. The separators themselves are great. I’m guessing that there isn’t that much of a difference between different makers. What amazed me was the beautiful little box they come in. I feel like the box itself is worth more than the entire cost of the item. It was a very unexpected surprise. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: ME7982

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have had these almost two weeks, they are holding up well. I have bunions forming and I'm using these, upon recommendation of a friend, to help my feet. The first few days wearing them it was painful, now I have built somewhat of a tolerance and can wear for 45 minutes or so. My feet get a good stretch. I received two pairs: small and medium. I am a women's size 8 and the small fit me well. The material seems durable and I love the lovely wooden box they came in as well!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Selub

customer_reviews.title: Comfert and easy to put on!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have recently discovered these beauties! they are super comfortable and easy to put on! I stand in one spot for 9 hours plus so its important that I get my toes back to normal position try them you will love them!! and the package is so beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Yogabody toe separators
customer_reviews.text: I do use this but I'm not totally crazy about it because when trying to sleep with it on it gets stuck on the sheets and covers hard to turn over. And when just trying to wear it during the day walking on it is awkward I couldn't imagine those in a shoe I think that would irritate the heck out of me
customer_reviews.author: Ramona R.

customer_reviews.title: These things can heal overlapping toes!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I had this toe next to my big toe which was broken at one point, and kept wanting to hang out on the poor big toe. It had become such a problem that I thought surgery would be necessary. Bought these toe separators in a desperate effort. I've only been wearing them on and off for four days, and the naughty toe is pulling away from the big toe. It's amazing and fantastic and I am so thrilled to have bought these. Thank you sincerely for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Helping with cramped nerve tracks.
customer_reviews.text: Because they are clear I am able to use it with my infrared light treatment. Separating the toes allows the light to reach the nerve tracks more easily.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: If you want a second set of hands. Get these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so my toes had enough room for flip flops. Not only did I get that but now my toes are so spread out it looks like they are always excited. I feel like I’ve gained a set of hands down there. I can pick things up with my feet. I’ve even started to eat with my feet. Working on driving but I can’t reach my hands down that far to press the gas. Soon.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: These are just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: The two default sizes of this product which arrived with my original order were both too small for my size 14 feet. However, the seller made up for that by sending me a larger size. I'm not a runner, but I did wear them this morning during a leisurely 6 mile stroll -- 4 miles to my chiropractor's office at South Lake Union, and 2 miles back to downtown Seattle -- and they were fine. I can highly recommend this product, especially as it has wide spaces between each toe, which will hopefully help after years of wearing overly tight, fashionable dress shoes, the kind that smash all of your toes together.
customer_reviews.author: HeathW

customer_reviews.title: Be patient
customer_reviews.text: Takes some time getting used to, be patient with the discomfort. But, that's to be expected. Works well with my Xero and Vivobarefoot shoes. Fantastic that they come with two pairs, I can use the regular, and my wife can use the small. Would have liked for them to be slightly curved to foot anatomy, but at the price point, I'm fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony King

customer_reviews.title: Nothing particularly special to pay this price
customer_reviews.text: The wooden box that this comes in is the only thing that makes this product more unique than similar, but lesser priced toe spacers. The box probably triples the cost of the product and adds to the weight of shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Rozz

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a difference Awesome Toes make 😊
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Awesome Toes after reviewing toe separator products on Amazon. The most amazing thing happened! They were comfortable, and are helping to reconfigure my senior toes which are plagued with hammer toes, bunions and callouses. I watched the video and learned about Lems shoes which I also bought and now my knee and lower back pain are dissipating due to the minimal zero drop. Awesome Toes come in 2 sizes and my spouse used the second pair and also tried Lems. We are one happy family! Thank you Lucas. P.S. Amazon pricing is much better than direct from manufacturer (YogaBody.com).
customer_reviews.author: plgoldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Spread your toes
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and soft. I just need to get into habit of wearing them every day. I also wore them to yoga for the first time and they kept slipping off especially of the big and pinky toes. I did love having them on during yoga practice as it is always encouraged to spread your toes in poses and now I can do it w/out even thinking about it. I just wish they didn't slip off. :/
customer_reviews.author: PNWMama

customer_reviews.title: Maybe work on small feet (women size 7 and under).
customer_reviews.text: I used the larger of the two option & they hurt my feet so I removed them after about 2 hours. I'm a woman with size 9 shoe so maybe it would work on smaller feet. I didn't give them enuf of a chance to know if they provide pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Macaleer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are so great. I work in a fast paced retail environment so I’m standing for 8+ hours a day and was looking for some relief at the end of the day. These were a random find for me but they have absolutely helped! They’re very comfortable too! I was also surprised to see two pairs! One small, one large and a really cool wooden case to store them in. I definitely love these!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Toe separator
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to assist with my pinky toe pain. It has started to curl under my foot and is very uncomfortable. While using the device at home i have had a great success at avoiding discomfort. I will however need to find shoes with a larger toe box to accommodate this device while i work on the alignment of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great for a sprained foot!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! I love these!! I bought some for my boyfriend and I. He sprained his foot pretty bad. I specifically bought them for him hoping they would help him. Within two days he was going on and on about how he can stand with no pain when he wears them. I was really impressed. Then I tried to practice yoga in them. My balance is AMAZING! The are super soft and comfortable. I don’t suggest them with shoes. My toes were a tad squished.
customer_reviews.author: Bria

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem effective
customer_reviews.text: They are difficult to get on. IMHO, I don't think that they provided the correct angle for the toes. I think this kind of think will work, but just not this one. I may need to spend a bit more and get one that works better.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Received a medium and a small :( I have big feet
customer_reviews.text: I really think these toe separators will be wonderful for me. However, the advertisement said I would receive a small and large. I received medium and small. No large. I am a size 10-10.5 women’s shoe I do think the manufacturer has a solid product. I just didn’t get the correct size :(
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: Potentially very useful
customer_reviews.text: My big toe was amputated in an accident 70 years ago; I've been fortunate to be able to dance and walk easily all these years, but in recent years the joint damage caused by compensation in my gait has become painful. I'm using the Yogabody Toe Spreaders for longer periods each day, and am hopeful that my problems are lessening, though the adjustment was painful at first. The toe spreaders are soft, yet effective. They fit well in my shoes, and they seem to be spreading the weight out well. In a month or so I'll know more. Meantime, I'm quite hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works with big feet.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 14 EE shoe and it conforms to my foot, does not cause restrictions. Easy to put on, works with compression shocks. Can wear 24/7, made of high quality material. Great value and two pairs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mooosejaw

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort. Both sizes useful for single wearer.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been through numerous pairs of toe spreaders and these are by far the most comfortable. I wear the larger ones while at home. The smaller with shoes. Neat wooden box is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Carr

customer_reviews.title: YogaBody Toe Spreaders
customer_reviews.text: I like that you get 2 sets in the box. I only need it on one foot, so I have plenty. They are gel so they are gentle and comfortable. if you want to wear it in your shoe, you should only plan to wear it for a short period of time as your foot might get sore due to it is not allowed to be in the usual alignment and of course this is the reason we want them in the first place. I like to put them on in the evenings while I am watching tv
customer_reviews.author: cathy eriksen

customer_reviews.title: totally worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: I've experienced more issues with my feet over the years and see less flexibility to the point that i have pain when i try to grip a towel with my toes as one of my pt exercises. One night of wearing the yoga toes while working around the house and watching tv and suddenly it's like have a massage therapist work the muscles in my feet..
customer_reviews.author: karen kimes

customer_reviews.title: They're great.
customer_reviews.text: They work, but they come in a bamboo box. That's where all the money for these things are at, in the box. No box & they would be cheaper, don't need to be a genius to figure that one out. Save some money & buy elsewhere, cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Popsy

customer_reviews.title: 2 pairs and 2 tears
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband. They really have helped him but could not give it any more stars cuz they tear. Last ones he got were in late May. 2 months later and already torn.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: They are very soft and easy to get on and off. I can wear both sizes, but the small is the most comfortable for my feet (size 10.5-11 women's, fairly wide feet). I really can't even feel them, and they are easy to walk around in or use during stretching. Not sure how well they will stand up to frequent use over time, but I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: Product is not useful
customer_reviews.text: I used this product and it is nothing like the description. It come in a pretty wooden box and that’s all. It did not correct my toe. I am very unhappy considering the amount of this product. I am not going to reorder this product
customer_reviews.author: Customer service

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: These toe separators come in a nice wooden box in two sizes and are very well made. Unfortunately after several months of trying them, I still cannot wear them for more than a couple of hours because they cause a lot of pain in my toes. I think the padding between the toes is too wide, and they don’t cover enough of my toe to help straighten my curling toes as I had hoped they would.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Best toe separator for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality toe separator for the price. Good to wear around the house without shoes. For me though these separate your toes too much to wear inside shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable, awesome toe spreaders I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have had many toe spreaders in my life time. I am 70 years old. These are the most comfortable, awesome toe spreaders I have ever had. I am overjoyed with them. They are so easy to put on, they stay in place, and are comfortable to walk on. I use the small size for day time and the medium size for bed time. My feet look great now! I am buying them for my 93 year old mother who is very active. They are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: JRROHAL

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! I wasn't sure how I would like the feel, but the product is very soft to the touch. One I have them in place they become comfortable right away. I mostly wear mine at rest. My feel are too wide in general to try and get these in a shoe, but I bet it would feel great and change my gait. I just like the subtle stretch they give, it's very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Deb K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but be mindful
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! I already feel my posture shifting for the better. Unfortunately I got too excited when I tried to take them off and ripped them after trying them on for the first time. I would suggest being mindful when taking them on and off as to avoid such a mishap. The material is comfortable to wear but a bit delicate to handle. Overall, happy and hopeful that I will see positive changes in my body.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: As advertized!
customer_reviews.text: Love the softness! Just received them and put them on immediately. You can walk with them, as advertised! I purchased them for foot health, not pain, so cannot speak to pain relief. My feet feel "massaged" and happy after 30 minutes of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 7 and even the larger size felt so tight I had to get it off after 15 minutes. The holes are simply much too small. The purpose is to spread the toes, not to squeeze them to death.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Bidois

customer_reviews.title: Happy toes.
customer_reviews.text: This product is fab. Have problems with my left foot only. Felt relief after a few hours only. Great customer service from YOGABODY. (One thing, and it's not YOGABODY'S problem, if you need this product in a hurry DO NOT rely on Amazon Prime...toe spreaders took 6 days to reach me.)
customer_reviews.author: J. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear ALL the time!
customer_reviews.text: Great service! Can’t comment on the success yet but they are comfortable enough to wear AND walk with them. I have tailors bunions hammer toes, and my toes are just starting to overlap. I am a runner and I routinely have numbness in my toes while running so I ahope this helps to Alevy that problem. I’ll post back later about the success! :)
customer_reviews.author: Connie McGee

customer_reviews.title: Works great. It comes with two sizes which worked well ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It comes with two sizes which worked well for my wife and I and they are a silicone type of material with a powdery feel. This worked well with my big hairy toes which I was afraid was going to get pulled. The awesome box these come in kinda steal the show and can easily be used for other stuff. To wash just use a little dish soap and air dry. I have mortan's neuroma (A thickening of the tissue around a nerve leading to the toes) a this provides relief after a day in tight shoes.
customer_reviews.author: madmardigin

customer_reviews.title: Not resistent
customer_reviews.text: Confortable but not very durable, I only wear mine with socks as they are not comfortable with shoes in less than a year 3 pairs got all deformed and not usable anymore I think it's because the material it's very soft and since I wear size 7 shoes it's not the result of big feet, I wouldn't buy them again I need something more resistant
customer_reviews.author: CGS

customer_reviews.title: Relieves foot pain
customer_reviews.text: I use to keep my little toes from curling under the toe next to it and stopping foot pain. I eventually cut the last two spacers off and use them daily while at work. I don't wear them at home as I am in sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Consumer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nail polish remover can disintegrate them. Thought I could do a little pedi in the meanwhile, but not. 👎
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, helpful but not when wearing shoes.
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable when just sitting. Not so much when walking. I don’t think you can use them with shoes comfortable. Smaller ones fit. Larger ones are too big so I can’t use them. Would be nice to get two pairs that I can actually use. Box is totally unnecessary. I would buy them again if I could get same size.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: I don't wear closed toed shoes very often, but when I do....
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear closed toed shoes very often, but when I do I put on my yoga toes when I take those shoes off. It's instant relief. I didn't give them 5 stars only because I could use a little more spacer for my big toe. I could just have a large gap between my big and 2nd toes, though. I love them so much I wear them around the office. I use a standing desk and I've noticed my feet are less swollen at the end of the day when I use my toe spreader.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Dean

customer_reviews.title: Pretty soft
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for just three weeks now. The set I got fits pretty well and is easy to put on. Haven't seen much difference yet on my toes separation. My physical therapist says it takes a little while unless you get the ones you can wear with shoes. I guess you get what you pay for. I'm ok with these.
customer_reviews.author: roland ngogang

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably positions toes in natural alignment.
customer_reviews.text: After noticing tendons shortening on 2nd-3rd toes on my left foot and both great toes turning inward I did research for corrective measures. After studying taping techniques, several styles of toe separators, I chose YogaBody. I have had them less than two weeks but can comfortably wear them several hours a day. When wearing toes are in proper alignment. I can feel ligament stretching but no discomfort. Toes remain in proper position for a minute or two after removing YogaBody toes. I know it will take several months to correct my issues but looks hopeful. Have not tried them in shoes yet. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. They are comfortable to wear, reduce pain in the feet, help tremendously with balance. Mine split at the big toe after 3 months of semi-regular use (3-4 times a week for 1-3 hours).
customer_reviews.author: Taylor H.

customer_reviews.title: Helps my tired feet
customer_reviews.text: Your feet do have to get used to the 'weird' feeling of something between your toes, but I love to feel them actually stretching. The material is soft and easily moves between your toes. They stay on easily too, no slipping off. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: happy feet = happy me
customer_reviews.text: I love these toe spreaders. My feel are feeling better after using them in short spurts every day since I got them. I have never used toes spacers before (aside from the cheap ones they use after a pedicure) and I think they are definitely something everyone with foot, leg, or back issues should consider! I enjoy YogaBody products. I can't speak for if they are better than any other kind, but I would certainly recommend this set. The storage box is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wasil

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me love them!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Really surprised. Excellent quality durability and comfort. Wish I had a back up pair. Using small size, I tend to forget where I put them. Wish it came with extra pair. My baby girl tries to put them on. Thanks guys your great!
customer_reviews.author: Simkhove

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife love them. They came in a very nice wooden box. Very welled packaged and shipped. High quality and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Gotshaw

customer_reviews.title: HOLY MOLY
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I robbed Amazon with the price. These things are so luxuriously packaged and work so well! I've been a long time fan of toe separators and have never found a pair that I can walk in. These are the exception. Totally worth the money and come in a very nice box. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Proton

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This my 3rd brand of yoga toes, and by far the most comfortable and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Update: Amazing customer service!: Smaller size falling apart already after two wears around house. Bummed.
customer_reviews.text: (update 6/9/17: customer service is top notch! I sent pics of the failing product and was able to get a replacement. The larger size has been fine this entire time, so it was simply a faulty set. I am very pleased with YogaToes and recommend them) Original post May 22,2017 I was super excited to try these and I do really love how they help my feet. But the other day I wore the smaller size around the house (wood floors) and just did basic chores and now they are splitting and falling apart. :( Not a good thing at all. Does the size make a difference in whether or not they fall apart??? I am super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: dramaqueen8376

customer_reviews.title: YogaBody Toe Spreaders for Hammer Toes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for the purpose only of left foot hammer toes. I wear them periodically to stretch those muscles. It is uncomfortable at first but not painful. I find it is helping and my walking has increased.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Maheux

customer_reviews.title: They work great and I thought they were way better than the ...
customer_reviews.text: The small size for spreaders fit perfectly. I wore them to bed and kept them on for about 3 hours when my toes started to get a little sore. They work great and I thought they were way better than the blue yoga toe things you see on Amazon which I also ordered and sent back. They were bulky. I have to socks that I ordered from Amazon too and love them.
customer_reviews.author: HAK

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product skeptical that it would alleviate pain and help me. Boy, was I wrong. I started out slow using it in the beginning for about 10-20 minutes. I am up to an hour and my feet feel great. I did more research on the benefits of this product and to my surprise I actually noticed that my posture was better and my feet felt better. I do have a bunion of on foot and it has helped with the pain tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These stretchers are very comfy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These toe stretchers are great. Comfortable, very soft and flexible. I, often, don’t even remember I’m wearing them. Nice stretch for the little toes on my super narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: sandella

product_meta.title: YOGABODY Naturals Toe Spreaders & Separators, Fast Pain Relief from Hammertoe & Bunions, Two Pairs in Stylish Wooden Box, Latex-Free Rubber Toe Stretchers Used for Nighttime, Yoga Practice & Running
product_meta.description: The Seresto flea and tick collar for dogs provides continuous 8 month flea and tick protection. Unlike oral flea and tick prevention products that require a bite, the Seresto collar repels fleas and ticks and kills through contact; no biting required. Frontline flea and tick treatment does not repel (based on label claims). Seresto flea collar for dogs is water resistant and remains effective after shampooing, swimming or exposure to rain or sunlight. (Dogs must not be bathed more than once per month. For dogs that swim once a month or more, the control duration is reduced to five months for flea control, and reduced to seven months for tick control.) This vet recommended flea and tick collar for dogs is odorless, non greasy and easy to apply. It can be used alongside other identification or restraining collars without damaging them. Avoid the hassle of messy monthly treatments and get the effective protection of Seresto dog flea and tick collars. Also available: Seresto flea and tick prevention for cats.
feature_bullets: Includes two pairs (smaller and larger) to fit everyone. Smaller pair: U.S. women sizes 4.5-7.5 / men sizes 4-7. Larger pair: U.S. women sizes 8-11 / men sizes 7.5-12. Size 12+ available upon request. If you fit initially in the smaller pair, use the larger one later for a bigger stretch. Beautiful, bamboo box included

Fast Pain Relief: from hammertoe, bunions, overlapping toes, and painful feet. Awesome Toes! naturally stretch your feet. Loved by anyone who wears high-heeled shoes, work boots, or spends all day standing.
Podiatrist Recommended Corrective Spacers: developed by yoga teacher, and endorsed by medical doctors and podiatrists for self-care.

Active-Wear Design: Awesome Toes! can be used at night, while watching TV, while practicing yoga, and even in wide-toed athletic shoes for running. Most toe separators on the market fall off or break during activities, but Awesome Toes! are designed for durability and comfort during yoga practice, dance rehearsals and while engaging in sports

Stretch Out Your Deformed Toes & Feet: buckled-up feet, overlapping toes, and even bunions and hammertoe can be caused by restrictive footwear and years of walking poorly. Awesome Toes! help stretch the shortened connective tissues of your feet so they regain their natural shape and range of motion
